mean_cn: n. 反语；冷嘲；具有讽刺意味的事
mean_en: a situation that is strange or funny because things happen in a way that seems to be the opposite of what you expected
short_phrase: the irony of falling next to a "caution: wet floor" sign
sentence: I slipped right next to the "do not slip" sign, and we all laughed at the irony.
sentence_trans: 我恰好在立有“注意别滑倒”的牌子旁滑了一跤，这讽刺场景让我们都笑了。
